title: Just released: Typo 18
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140658/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 6.Feb.2006 8.31am 

//////////

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140658im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_cover_18.jpg)

The 18th issue of the TYPO magazine is dedicated to British typographer  
Matthew Carter, who recently celebrated the fiftieth anniversary since the  
beginning of his career. The essay outlining Carter’s lifelong work was  
composed by Margaret Re, American researcher of typography and a curator of  
the exhibition Typographically Speaking: The Art of Matthew Carter. It also  
includes an overview of all Carter’s typefaces composed since 1963.  
On further twenty pages of the magazine, Carter was interviewed by our  
Polish contributor Adam Twardoch, recapitulating his career, sharing his  
intimate views on the work of a typographer, and even revealing personal  
details from the life of this typographic star.

The TYPO magazine is published bi-monthly in English and Czech since January  
2003. It contains 32-44 full color pages printed on high quality coated  
paper of 250 × 310 mm format. Information on subscriptions at  
 [www.magtypo.cz](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140658/http:/www.magtypo.cz/ "www.magtypo.cz"). Contact: Linda Kudrnovska, editorial office manager  
( [linda@magtypo.cz](mailto:linda@magtypo.cz)).

//////////
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: Can this be bought in stores in the US?

I don’t think so but it’s easy enough to order directly.
